summary: Completed comprehensive testing of fuel delivery & booking app MVP. All core features working correctly including customer booking flow, admin management, pricing calculations with all taxes, and multi-truck booking functionality.

design_issues.issue:
HTML validation warning:
inside

tag causing hydration error
Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent accessibility

passed_tests: Admin login with demo account (admin@fuel.com / admin123)
Customer login with demo account (customer@fuel.com / customer123)
Customer booking creation with all fields (address, fuel type, quantity, date, time, special instructions, multiple locations, multiple trucks)
Price calculation with fuel price + federal carbon tax + Quebec carbon tax + GST + QST
Customer can view their bookings and delivery logs
Admin dashboard displays correct stats (total revenue, bookings, liters, customers)
Admin can update booking status (pending, confirmed, in_transit, delivered, cancelled)
Admin can create delivery logs for bookings
Blue and green color scheme implementation
All 13 backend API endpoints working correctly

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all core functionality working, minor HTML/accessibility warnings)
